name: Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Systems
goal: OASIS is a nonprofit consortium that drives the development, convergence and adoption of open standards for the global information society.  OASIS is one of the largest and oldest open standards consortia in the Internet and ICT domain.  OASIS promotes industry consensus and produces worldwide standards for cybersecurity, the Internet of Things, cloud computing, energy, content technologies, emergency management and crisis response, and other areas.
euInitiatives:
(1) ICT Standardisation policy, e.g., Regulation (EU) No 1025/2012
(2) Digital Single Market initiatives
